issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The use of {{Collections.EMPTY_SET}} and {{Collections.EMPTY_MAP}} often causes unchecked assignment and it should be replaced with {{Collections.emptySet()}} and {{Collections.emptyMap()}}.
fields.summary: Replace Collections.EMPTY* with empty* when available

Thanks [~ajisakaa] for comments.I have remove all of {{Collections.EMPTY_MAP}},{{Collections.EMPTY_SET}} , {{Collections.emptyList()}} and unnecessary {{@SuppressWarning("unchecked")}} annotations.Hope you can review again, thanks a lot.

Would you replace {{Collections.EMPTY_MAP}} in SingleConstraintAppPlacementAllocator.java? I'm +1 if that is addressed.

Thanks [~ajisakaa] for review.
